distributed.hadoop

Class AbstractHadoopJobConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJobConfig
      • distributed.hadoop.AbstractHadoopJobConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, OptionHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HDFSConfig, MapReduceJobConfig

    public abstract class AbstractHadoopJobConfig
extends distributed.core.DistributedJobConfig
    Base job config for Hadoop-related jobs to extend
